catalog.name: United Kingdom Hadley Centre Climate Model Version 3 Output

dataset.name: United Kingdom Hadley Centre Climate Model Version 3 Output

documentation.xlink:title: NCAR GDEX - United Kingdom Hadley Centre Climate Model Version 3 Output(d317001)

metadata.documentation: Products of special run of United Kingdom Hadley Centre Climate Model version 3 forced with A2 emissions scenario from Special Report on Emissions Scenarios for the 21st century are in the dataset. The results are used as boundary conditions for North American Regional Climate Change Assessment Program.
